reviewText: One review confuses the Meiji Restoration with the French Revolution. Japan and France are not the same country. That review should simply be removed as it is nonsense.

I saw Eijanaika years ago in a movie theater and finally found a VHS copy on Amazon.  It includes a fine performance by Ken Ogata, one of my favorite Japanese actors.  Ogata, who was also in Mishima and The Ballad of Narayama, passed away a few years ago, may he rest in peace.
I really enjoyed this film. A good and fairly unpredictable plot as well as great acting from all involved. Must see.
